<Head>
info: # Objects placed in the head section (html) ## Toolbar Ui ## Solar indices - from [n0nbh](https://www.hamqsl.com) SFi -Solar Flux activiy at 10.7 cm A - Daily average level for geomagnetic activity K - The K-index quantifies disturbances in the horizontal component of earth's magnetic field with an integer in the range 09 G - GeoMagentic Storm - G0 = None Predicted, G1 = Minor, G2 = Moderate, G3 = Strong, G4, Severe, G5 Extreme ## Current Wx - Data from [openweathermap](https://openweathermap.org/) Temp Wind Direction / Speed Sky Conditions Barometric Trend - up/down/level ## Lightning Distance to last strike - Set distance in user config node -strike_distance Time to last strike - Time in 1-59min, 1-24hrs, 1-~day. Default is 180 day before 1st strike is recorded ## UTC Clock Current format is 4/13/22, 20:00 UTC ` function displayTime() { var d = Date(); var options = { timeZone: 'UTC', timeZoneName: 'short', year: '2-digit', month: 'numeric', day: 'numeric', hourCycle: 'h23', hour: `2-digit`, minute: `2-digit`}; p.text(new Date().toLocaleString('en-US', options)); }` The format is based on toLocaleString based formats. See documentation W3_Schools_toLocaleString

name: Toolbar UI
info:
# Solar / Wx / Lightning / Clock

1. solar data from Solar flow variables:  #kdx, #sfi, #Aindex

2.  Open Weather icons for current conditions: Temp, Wind Dir / Speed, Current Conditions,  Barometric Trend

3. Lightning Strike Distance - If < 25Km, then distance in miles is shown.  >25Km distance default.
4. Lightning Stirke Icon - When < 15Km,  Icon = Red.  >25Km = green.
5. Last Strike - Time from last strike in min(1-59), hrs(1-23), and day(1-~).  Last time is determined when strike occurs.  Default is 180 days if variable is undefined.

6. UTC Clock with seconds
